title: Relationship of artist and society Ren and 19th C

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Compare and contrast the relationship between the artist and society in the Renaissance/Reformation period to the relationship between the artist and society in the late nineteenth century.

frqParts.text:

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

topic.text: 2.7: Art of the 16th Century: Mannerism and Baroque Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
